OPENDATA-WIZARD.CancelSharingDescription: You can cancel this request to share the data file before it is approved.  The request to share will be deleted from system; however, the data file will remain stored in DataHub and may be shared in the future. Once approved, you will not be able to cancel the request.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.CancelSharingPrompt: Do you want to cancel this sharing request? To share this file in the future, the process will have to be restarted from the beginning.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.UnpublishOpenDataSharingPrompt: Do you want to cancel this file sharing on Open Data?
OPENDATA-WIZARD.Approval_filled_out: - Approval form has been filled out, now you can generate the approval form document.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.GeneratePDF_explanation: - Once you generate the approval form, please upload it to GCdocs and paste the URL of this file in the section below.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.Publish_As_URL_Desc1: Publish a URL to Open Data. The File is stored in DataHub.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.Publish_As_URL_Desc2: Note: The URL link will be broken if the File is deleted from DataHub.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.Upload_And_Publish_Desc: Publish an uploaded File to Open Data. A copy of the File is stored in DataHub.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.Uploading_file_in_progress: Uploading file in progress. You can wait or come back later if the file is too big. The upload is running in the background.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.Approval_Filled_out_1: Once the Open Government Approval Form is completed, generate the approval form.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.Approval_Filled_out_2: Save the generated approval form to GCdocs.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.Approval_Filled_out_3: Paste the GCdocs file link (https://gcdocs.gc.ca/nrcan-rncan/llisapi.dll/link/XXXXXXXX) in the section below.
OPENDATA-WIZARD.MustAcknowledgeMandatoryReleaseCriteria: You must acknowledge and check all Mandatory Release Criteria boxes before submitting.

PUBLIC-URL-WIZARD.CancelSharingDescription: You may cancel the sharing request at any time before approval. This will completely remove the sharing request from the system. However, the file will still remain in storage and may be shared in the future.
PUBLIC-URL-WIZARD.CancelSharingPrompt: Do you want to cancel this sharing request? To share this file in the future, the process will have to be restarted from the beginning.
PUBLIC-URL-WIZARD.DeleteExpiredDescription: This file is no longer publicly available, and the public sharing record may be deleted. The file itself will stay in storage.
PUBLIC-URL-WIZARD.DeleteExpiredPrompt: Delete the sharing request? After it's deleted, the file can be shared again by starting a new sharing request.
PUBLIC-URL-WIZARD.TempSharingDesc: You may optionally specify an expiration date, after which your file will no longer be publicly available.

ValidationErrors.ExpiryDateInPast: Expiration date cannot be in the past.
ValidationErrors.TempWithNoExpiry: Expiration date must be specified when temporary sharing is enabled.

DATA-SHARING-DASHBOARD.NoFilesAwaitingApproval: this project has no sharing requests awaiting approval.

DATA-SHARING-DASHBOARD.NoOtherSharedFiles: There are no files shared by other users in this project.

NOTIFICATION-TEXT.ServiceAccessRequestApproved: Your request for the access to service {0} in Data Project {1} has been approved.
NOTIFICATION-TEXT.ServiceAccessRevoked: Your access to service {0} in Data Project {1} has been revoked. The service links in the Data Project page will no longer be available.
NOTIFICATION-TEXT.ServiceCreationRequested: User {0} has requested the creation of service {1} in Data Project {2}. Please visit the admin page to notify users when it has been created.

NOTIFICATION-TEXT.ServiceCreatedGroup: Service {0} has been created in Data Project {1}.

NOTIFICATION-TEXT.PublicUrlShareApproved: Your request to share {0} in project {1} has been approved.
NOTIFICATION-TEXT.PublicUrlShareApprovedLater: Your request to share {0} in project {1} has been approved. The file will be publicly available on {2}.
NOTIFICATION-TEXT.OpenDataPublicationApproved: Your request to publish {0} from project {1} to Open Data has been approved.

REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.Title: Power BI Request Confirmation
REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.ErrorApproving: An error occurred while trying to approve the Power BI request.
REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.WorkspaceNameConflict: One or more of the following workspaces is missing a field or conflicts with an existing Power BI workspace:
REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.WorkspaceNameConflictInstruction: Please update the parameters or use the Power BI management interface in the Admin section to address any conflicts.
REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.WorkspacesToBeCreated: The following workspaces will be created and/or registered, and Power BI features will be enabled for this project:
REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.WorkspacesCreated: The Power BI service has been enabled and the following workspaces have been created:
REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.UsersToBeAdded: These workspace users will be added to the workspaces:
REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.PowerBiAlreadyEnabled: this project already has Power BI enabled. No further action is needed.
REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.NoPowerBiRequest: this project has no open Power BI request at this time.
REQUEST_APPROVAL_PAGE.NoPowerBiPermission: Your account doesn't have permissions to create Power BI workspaces.

POWER_BI_ADMIN.Title: Power BI Administration
POWER_BI_ADMIN.UnassignedWarning: Warning: This item's workspace is not linked to a Data Project.
POWER_BI_ADMIN.ChangesExist: There are workspaces, reports and/or datasets available in Power BI which are out of sync with the DataHub database. Expand the section below for more details.
POWER_BI_ADMIN.InstructionsP1: In this section, you can associate Power BI workspaces with Data Projects, and enter metadata for workspaces, reports and datasets in order to add them to the catalog. Workspaces can also be marked as "Sandbox" to indicate that they should not be included by default in search results.
POWER_BI_ADMIN.InstructionsP2: Assigning a workspace to a Data Project allows users of that Data Project to quickly and easily find the workspace and reports within it. Workspaces should be assigned to a Data Project before entering any metadata for the workspace or any reports within it, to allow the system to automatically populate some metadata fields if the information is available.
POWER_BI_ADMIN.InstructionsAdmin: In this Administration view, you have access to Power BI workspaces across all Data Projects in DataHub.
